title: Heart-Stopping Texts
alt: Was this your car? [looping 'image loading' animation]
transcript:
[Comic heading:]
Most heart-stopping texts to receive out of the blue[A collection of light gray text bubbles in two columns:]Did you forget what day it is?I bet you're probably getting bombarded with texts right now, huh?Did you mean to post that to everyone?Is this your house? cnn.com/2021/11/19/S...You didn't click on any weird emails recently, did you?Can I call?Wait, do you know Joe Rogan? How does he know your name?Why are you trending on Twitter?
